data.title: Various Artists - The Rough Guide to Acoustic Africa [CD]

data.text:
Description

Brand New From Reputable UK Company With 30 Years Experience In Retail, Please Note Not All Our New Items Are Shrink Wrapped.All items shipped within 3 working days of payment.Please note that all our DVDs are Region 2.Please note that not all audio CDs are shrink-wrapped fom the factory.Discover the soulful sounds of 'Various - The Rough Guide to Acoustic Africa [CD]', a captivating collection showcasing the rich acoustic traditions of the African continent. This carefully curated album features celebrated artists such as Habib Koit\xe9, Daby Tour\xe9, and Sambou Susso, highlighting their exceptional musical craftsmanship. Each track is handpicked to represent the diverse and vibrant acoustic heritage, blending traditional rhythms with contemporary influences. Immerse yourself in the enchanting melodies and intricate instrumentation that define Acoustic Africa, offering a profound and authentic listening experience.Disc 11. Etran Finatawa - Saghmar N Nanna - Etran Finatawa2. Lala Njava - Sweet Lullaby - Lala Njava3. Syran Mbenza and Ensemble Rumba Kongo - Mbanda Nasali Nini? (Madeleine) - Syran Mbenza and Ensemble Rumba Kongo4. Shiyani Ngcobo - Yekanini - Shiyani Ngcobo5. Sotho Sounds - Ha Kele Monateng - Sotho Sounds6. Monoswezi - Ndinewe - Monoswezi7. Eyuphuro - Masikini - Eyuphuro8. Koo Nimo - See Wo Nom Me (Tsetse Fly You Suck My Blood) - Koo Nimo9. Mr Eddy and Sally Nyolo - Obili eba - Mr Eddy and Sally Nyolo10. Samba Toure - White Crocodile Blues (A Song For M) (Instrumental) - Samba Toure11. Abdel Gadir Salim - Lemon Bara - Abdel Gadir Salim12. Amadou Diagne - Diamano - Amadou Diagne13. Mory Kante - Djou - Mory Kante14. Vakoka - Aomby Mazava Loha - Vakoka15. Nuru Kane - Afrika - Nuru Kane16. Mabulu - AIDS (But Hope) - MabuluDisc 21. Intro \u2013 Interlude 1 - Noumoucounda Cissoko2. Noumou Koradioulou - Noumoucounda Cissoko3. Nagnou Talal Loxxo Afrique - Noumoucounda Cissoko4. Sining feat. Tumi Molekane - Noumoucounda Cissoko5. Interlude 2 - Noumoucounda Cissoko6. Dindingo A Bamah - Noumoucounda Cissoko7. Bannaya Foly - Noumoucounda Cissoko8. Begg Ci Yow - Noumoucounda Cissoko9. Yekhi Medina - Noumoucounda Cissoko10. Interlude 3 - Noumoucounda Cissoko11. Gorgni - Noumoucounda Cissoko12. Bannadenoufele - Noumoucounda Cissoko13. Outro \u2013 Interlude 4 - Noumoucounda Cissoko

Delivery and Returns

Dispatch Information: Dispatch times vary by item and items are only dispatched on UK working days – not weekends or UK Bank Holidays. Items marked "Sent Sameday" will be dispatched on the day of purchase if bought before 1pm GMT. "Sent Same Day" items bought after 1pm GMT or on a non-working day will be dispatched on the next working day. We aim to dispatch all other items within 5-7 working days.

Delivery Information: We aim to deliver your order as quickly and efficiently as possible. All UK orders are dispatched using Royal Mail 48 Tracked service and the standard delivery times are 2-3 business days. Please note that delivery times for overseas orders will vary depending on your location and the shipping option you choose during checkout.

Shipping Costs: We offer free delivery on all UK orders and free worldwide delivery on orders over £15.

Tracking Your Order: All UK orders are tracked. Once your order is dispatched, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this tracking number to monitor the progress of your delivery on the Royal Mail Track and Trace website.

Returns and Exchanges: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not happy with your order, you may return it within 28 days of the item being dispatched for a refund or exchange. Please note the following guidelines:

- Items must be returned in their original condition and packaging – items that have been opened or had shrink wrap removed are not eligible for return or refund.

- Make sure to include your order number in the returned package.

How to Initiate a Return: To initiate a return or exchange, please contact our customer service team. The team is available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have about the process.

Refund Processing: Refunds will be processed as soon as we receive your item back into our warehouse. Replacements are subject to availability and if a replacement is not available, a refund will be issued.

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team or check out our FAQ’s. We're here to help ensure your shopping experience is enjoyable and hassle-free. Thank you for choosing Chalkys!
